channel.title: Mini uzi
channel.description:
After going through watching/reading a bunch of tutorials on modelling, I figured I'd try my hand at a gun. Here's the picture I used to model:
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25223279/mini-uzi.jpg[/img]
Here's the final product I came up with: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25223279/uzi.png[/img]
Here's a couple wireframes: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25223279/uzi-wf.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/25223279/uzi-wf-2.png[/img]
This was also my first time using any sort of texture (I just used the picture I modelled from, in all honesty). If you guys have any tips I'd love to hear them. Also, I know I'm probably going to get flamed pretty hard for it being bad, but bleh, I had fun making it.
If anyone would mind explaining how to go about adding more details, such as the indents on the body of the gun, and the screws and stuff, that would be awesome.

item.title: Mini uzi
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

made this a long long time ago, its for c4d but the process is the same:

http://www.c4dcafe.com/ipb/files/file/745-modeling-a-low-poly-usp-45-caliber-pistol/
